LanguageData.ArmoredFloor.label: armored floor
LanguageData.ArmoredFloor.description: Thick armor plating. Excelent at keeping bugs out of overhead mountain tiles and netural in terms of looks, but very slow to build.
LanguageData.CarpetBlueArmored.label: armored blue carpet
LanguageData.CarpetBlueArmored.description: Toe-hugging plush carpet in a cool blue color with armored underlay.
LanguageData.CarpetCreamArmored.label: armored cream carpet
LanguageData.CarpetCreamArmored.description: Inviting cream-colored carpet with armored underlay.
LanguageData.CarpetDarkArmored.label: armored dark carpet
LanguageData.CarpetDarkArmored.description: Professional-looking dark gray carpet with armored underlay.
LanguageData.CarpetGreenArmored.label: armored green carpet
LanguageData.CarpetGreenArmored.description: Naturalistic-feeling green carpet. Earth tones, dude. With armored underlay.
LanguageData.CarpetRedArmored.label: armored red carpet
LanguageData.CarpetRedArmored.description: Plush carpet in a lovely rose hue with armored underlay.
LanguageData.ConcreteArmored.label: armored concrete
LanguageData.ConcreteArmored.description: Rough concrete with an armored underlay.
LanguageData.FlagstoneGraniteArmored.label: armored granite flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneGraniteArmored.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.FlagstoneLimestoneArmored.label: armored limestone flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneLimestoneArmored.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.FlagstoneMarbleArmored.label: armored marble flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneMarbleArmored.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstoneArmored.label: armored sandstone flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstoneArmored.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.FlagstoneSlateArmored.label: armored slate flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneSlateArmored.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.GoldTileArmored.label: armored gold tile
LanguageData.GoldTileArmored.description: For overbearing extravagance, nothing beats gold tiles. They are exceptionally expensive, and exceptionally beautiful, and people will think you're exceptionally snobbish if you actually live on them. With armored underlay.
LanguageData.MetalTileArmored.label: armored steel tile
LanguageData.MetalTileArmored.description: Steel tiles, for that spaceship look. They are pretty, and the smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness. With armored underlay.
LanguageData.PavedTileArmored.label: armored paved tile
LanguageData.PavedTileArmored.description: Concrete tiles with armored underlay. Cheap, but neutral in terms of looks and slow to build.
LanguageData.SilverTileArmored.label: armored silver tile
LanguageData.SilverTileArmored.description: For a futuristic but royal look, silver tiles fit perfectly into luxurious rooms. They get a bonus to cleanliness. With armored underlay.
LanguageData.SterileTileArmored.label: armored sterile tile
LanguageData.SterileTileArmored.description: Sterile tiles with special cleanliness-enhancing properties. Extra-clean rooms improve outcomes in hospitals and research labs. This tile is very slow to build. With armored underlay.
LanguageData.TileGraniteArmored.label: armored granite tile
LanguageData.TileGraniteArmored.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileLimestoneArmored.label: armored limestone tile
LanguageData.TileLimestoneArmored.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileMarbleArmored.label: armored marble tile
LanguageData.TileMarbleArmored.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileSandstoneArmored.label: armored sandstone tile
LanguageData.TileSandstoneArmored.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileSlateArmored.label: armored slate tile
LanguageData.TileSlateArmored.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloorArmored.label: armored wood floor
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloorArmored.description: Wood plank flooring for that warm, homey feeling. While it is quick to lay, it is also very flammable. With armored underlay.
